body_html:
I uninstalled "pytorch-gpu" from the anaconda gui and installed cuda 8 through the terminal with:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith

Now running the script gives an error at the import statement:
Traceback (most recent call last):

File "", line 1, in
runfile('/home/robert/Downloads/Data/pytorch/pytorch1.py', wdir='/home/robert/Downloads/Data/pytorch')

File "/home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spyder/utils/site/sitecustomize.py", line 688, in runfile
execfile(filename, namespace)

File "/home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spyder/utils/site/sitecustomize.py", line 101, in execfile
exec(compile(f.read(), filename, 'exec'), namespace)

File "/home/robert/Downloads/Data/pytorch/pytorch1.py", line 9, in
import torch

File "/home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 53, in
from torch._C import *

ImportError: /home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1: undefined symbol: ZN4thpp8THTensorIiEC1EP13THLongStorageS3

body:
I uninstalled "pytorch-gpu" from the anaconda gui and installed cuda 8 through the terminal with:
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith

Now running the script gives an error at the import statement:
Traceback (most recent call last):

  File "<ipython-input-1-2739f6cb979a>", line 1, in <module>
    runfile('/home/robert/Downloads/Data/pytorch/pytorch1.py', wdir='/home/robert/Downloads/Data/pytorch')

  File "/home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spyder/utils/site/sitecustomize.py", line 688, in runfile
    execfile(filename, namespace)

  File "/home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/spyder/utils/site/sitecustomize.py", line 101, in execfile
    exec(compile(f.read(), filename, 'exec'), namespace)

  File "/home/robert/Downloads/Data/pytorch/pytorch1.py", line 9, in <module>
    import torch

  File "/home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 53, in <module>
    from torch._C import *

ImportError: /home/robert/anaconda3/envs/alpha/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/lib/libTHD.so.1: undefined symbol: _ZN4thpp8THTensorIiEC1EP13THLongStorageS3_
